snippet: President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. appeared together for the first time after a week of tension over the issue of same-sex marriage.
abstract: President Obama and Vice President Joseph R Biden Jr honor 34 law enforcement officers chosen as the year's Top Cops; it is their first public appearance together after a week of tension over the issue of same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. appeared together for the first time after a week of tension over the issue of same-sex marriage.

headline.seo: Obama and Biden Honor Top Cops in White House Ceremony
headline.main: Obama and Biden Honor Officers in Ceremony
headline.print_headline: Obama and Biden Honor Officers in Ceremony
